content: I have learned of a Vocabulary of digital-signature purpose that is defined in an ETSI Technical Specification. How best can that be brought into FHIR for inclusion in the valueset on Signature.type? See Annex B of https://www.etsi.org/deliver/etsi_ts/119100_119199/11917201/01.01.01_60/ts_11917201v010101p.pdf
